fields_of_interest: Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Food Safety, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- The EU Emissions Trading System (EU ETS) 
- Carbon Capture and Geological Storage (CCS) 
- EU Climate & Energy-, Transport- & Trade policies  
- The European Economic Area (EEA) 
- Fishery policies
customers: The Federation of Norwegian Industries# Norwegian Wind Energy Association
goals__remit: Lowwel is a consulting firm helping predominately Norwegian entities, NGOs, companies, business federations, Universities and research organisations, to find its way into the EU decision making system. As Norway is part of the EEA, but not a member of the EU, Norway is without any representatives in the EU decision making bodies.
